impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FIDICI - Fined and detained in default of payment until court rises
To be detained in the courthouse . Detention deemed served by reason of time already spent in custody. Total amount enforced £11.00.
FO - Fine
Fined £100.00
ACON - Account Consolidated
Account to be consolidated with existing accounts. 
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 20/07/2026.
impositionOffenceDetails.title: Theft of motor vehicle

subject: WRITE OFF ONE DAY DEEMED SERVED
